result.arabic_text: وَيَسۡـَٔلُونَكَ عَن ذِي ٱلۡقَرۡنَيۡنِۖ قُلۡ سَأَتۡلُواْ عَلَيۡكُم مِّنۡهُ ذِكۡرًا
result.translation: Baranakubaza (yewe Muhamadi) ku witwa Dhul Qar’nayini.[1] Vuga uti “Ndagira icyo mubabwiraho.”
result.footnotes: [1] Dhul Qar’nayini: Ni izina ry’umuntu wavuzwe muri Qur’an, wari umwami w’umunyakuri akaba ari we wubatse urukuta rurinda abantu kugerwaho n’ibikorwa by’inkozi z’ibibi zitwa Yaajuja na Maajuja.
